facebook/OpenBIC.summary: Recent activities in the OpenBIC repository have primarily focused on version commits for various BICs, including ob-minerva-ag-2024.52.01, oby4-sd-2024.52.01, and oby4-wf-2024.52.01. Additionally, several pull requests have been submitted and merged to modify cpld default values, pdr sensor names, and UBC delayed detection. These updates aim to enhance the functionality and stability of the OpenBIC system.

facebook/fbthrift.summary: Recent activities in the fbthrift repository have involved updates to the parser and support for literals. A push event introduced `maybe_managed_ptr` to enhance memory management, and another update modified the parser to accept format strings. These changes aim to improve the efficiency and flexibility of the fbthrift library.

facebook/rocksdb.summary: Recent activities in the rocksdb repository have addressed issues with unit test flakiness. A pull request has been submitted to update the `RoundRobinSubcompactionsAgainstPressureToken` test, aiming to reduce flakiness by ensuring sufficient input files for compactions and verifying the number of planned subcompactions. This update seeks to improve the reliability of the rocksdb test suite.
